LandingPage.mainHeading: Apne Safar ko Taqat Dein. Ek Saath.
LandingPage.subHeading: FEMMORA khawateen ke liye jurrne, apni baat kehne, aur aage barhne ki ek panahgah hai. Apne liye banayi gayi is jagah par, apni behtari, takhleeqi salahiyat, aur community ko explore karein.
LandingPage.thriveParagraph: FEMMORA mein, hum sabki mil kar kaam karne ki taqat par yaqeen rakhte hain. Hamara platform sirf ek app nahi hai; yeh har aurat ki behtari aur kamyabi ke anokhe safar ka jashn manane aur uski himayat karne ke liye ek tehreek hai.
LandingPage.featuresHeading: Khaas Aapke Liye Banaye Gaye Features
LandingPage.featuresSubHeading: Aapko apni zaati aur peshawarana taraqqi ke liye jo kuch bhi chahiye, sab ek jagah par.
LandingPage.featureSoulSpaceTitle: SoulSpace: Aapka Jazbati Sehat ka Saathi
LandingPage.featureSoulSpaceDescription: Ek mehfooz digital panahgah jahan aapke jazbaat ko hamdardi se samjha jaata hai. Chahe aap pareshan hon, kuch soch rahi hon, ya behtar mehsoos kar rahi hon, SoulSpace aapki sunta hai - aapko rehnumai, narm isharay, aur aise AI sathi deta hai jo aapke dil ki zaban bolte hain.
LandingPage.featureHerHealthDescription: Apne cycles, neend aur zehni dabao ko ek pursukoon jagah par track karein. HerHealth aapko samajhne ke liye smart AI ka istemal karta hai - aapke jism ki taal ka khayal rakhte hue, lifestyle mein tabdeeliyan, reminders, aur madadgar routines tajweez karta hai.
LandingPage.featureNourishTitle: Nourish: Aapke Liye Makhsoos Ghiza aur Diet ka Guide
LandingPage.featureNourishDescription: Har aurat ke safar ke liye banaya gaya - taqat se lekar apni dekhbhal tak. Nourish aapke mood, sehat ke maqasid aur culture ke mutabiq khane ki tajaveez deta hai. Har sifarish mohabbat se di jaati hai, pabandi se nahi.
LandingPage.featureEvolveTitle: Evolve: Halki Phulki Fitness aur Tawanai ka Bahao
LandingPage.featureEvolveDescription: Apni raftaar se chalein - yoga, mindful harkat, aur khawateen ke liye makhsoos warzishein jo aapki tawanai aur jazbati halat ke mutabiq hon. Evolve mein har harkat is baat ka jashn hai ke aapka jism kya kar sakta hai, na ke usey kya karna chahiye.
LandingPage.featureCircleDescription: Khawateen ke liye ek doosre se judne, kahaniyan share karne, aur ek doosre ko himmat dene ke liye ek khoobsurat moderate ki gayi jagah. Rozana check-in se lekar takhleeqi challenges tak, Circle baghair muqable ke ittehad ka jashn manata hai - taqat ki ek digital behnchara.
LandingPage.featureFEMMindTitle: FEMMind: Aapka AI-Guided Taraqqi ka Partner
LandingPage.featureFEMMindDescription: Teen behtareen-tuned, hamdard LLMs - Sehat, Jazbati Sehat, aur Zindagi ki Rehnumai ke liye. Woh sirf jawab nahi dete - woh samajhte hain, science ko hamdardi ke sath mila kar aisa mashwara dete hain jo aapko behtar banata hai, na ke sirf hidayat deta hai.

logoutSuccess.title: Aap Log Out Hogaye

logoutError.title: Oh No!
logoutError.description: Aap ko logout nahi kiya ja saka. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein.

error.emailInUse: Yeh email pehle se istemal mein hai. Barah-e-karam iske bajaye login karein.

profileSuccess.description: Aapki tabdeeliyan kamyabi se save ho gayi hain.

profileError.title: Update nakam
profileError.description: Aapki profile save karne mein masla hua. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein.

placeholders.health: Jaise, Main ghar par ek aasan warzish ka routine kaise shuru kar sakti hoon?
placeholders.emotionalWellbeing: Jaise, Main stress mehsoos kar rahi hoon, koi fori mindfulness tips?
placeholders.nutrition: Jaise, Kuch sehatmand snack ke ideas kya hain?

initialMessages.health: Hi! Main aapka Healthcare assistant hoon. Main aaj aapki kaise madad kar sakti hoon?
initialMessages.emotionalWellbeing: Hello, Main yahan aapki jazbati behtari ke liye hoon. Aapke zehen mein kya hai?
initialMessages.nutrition: Hey! Main aapka Diet guide hoon. Sehatmand khane ke baray mein kuch bhi poochein!

ChatInterface.errorMessage: Maaf kijiyega, kuch ghalat ho gaya. Barah-e-karam baad mein dobara koshish karein.

DietPage.description: Apne khane, hydration, aur hazmay ki sehat ko track karein.

waterTracker.description: Rozana pani ke istemal ko log karein. Din mein 8 glass ka hadaf rakhein!

bristol.2: Type 2: Guthli wala aur sausage jaisa

mealHistory.title: Khane ki History
mealHistory.noHistory: Aap ne abhi tak koi khana log nahi kiya. Shuru karne ke liye upar ek shamil karein!

aiChat.description: Ghizaiyat ke baray mein sawalat hain? Neechay apne AI assistant se poochein.

logSuccess.title: Khana Log Hogaya!
logSuccess.description: Aapka khana aur uski ghizai maloomat save ho gayi hain.

bleedingHistory.noHistory: Abhi tak koi mukammal cycle nahi. Shuru karne ke liye apna pehla period log karein!
bleedingHistory.noNotes: Is cycle ke liye koi notes nahi.
